name: MediaManager
author: maxdorninger
description: Modern management system for your TV and movie library. Designed as a replacement for Sonarr, Radarr, Overseerr, and Jellyseerr with support for TVDB, TMDB, OIDC authentication, Prowlarr and Jackett integration.

form_fields.label: JWT Token Secret
form_fields.hint: Secret key for signing authentication tokens (auto-generated)

form_fields.label: Admin Email
form_fields.hint: Email address for the administrator account
